summary: This mod adds most alchemy ingredients at excess of 10+, with the exception of different rare salts.
descriptionHtml:
Although I already have a mod similar, I had several people ask me for a rare ingredient, and more base ingredients mod.
So I made this mod, no more vendors only having 1-3 bits and pieces of things. They will have 10+ from now on.
Make sure to wait 24 hours for the ingame vendor respawns to take affect for this mod.

Requirements: Only Skyrim is required for this mod.
author: Hadoumastery
